subject: Add interest notification API and frontend form
body:
Set up Vercel serverless functions for an interest/contact notification
system. The send-interest endpoint validates input (name, email, message),
enforces CORS origin restrictions, includes honeypot spam protection, and
sends emails via SMTP using nodemailer. A health endpoint is included for
deployment verification. The frontend InterestForm React component handles
form state, submission, and gracefully degrades when the API URL is not
configured.
